page.title: 05LOCAL HOUSING
page.content: Most of the houses in the Feltham area were built before or after the First World War. Many are the same as the one that I live in e.g. terrace houses. This is where four or more houses have been built together. When they were first built at the turn of the century they only cost between Â£295 and Â£595 depending on the size. The present price for these same houses is between Â£38000 and Â£48000. Some of the houses have three bedrooms whereas others only have two. Also,some have their bathrooms downstairs but the majority like mine have them upstairs. Over the last three or four years some new town houses have been built on a new estate called Brookside,this was once fields with horses in them.
